headlines.description: Mohamed Salah scored a hat trick as Liverpool eased to a 4-0 win at Bournemouth and returned to the top of the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah grabs hat trick as Liverpool top table

headlines.description: Lucas Torreira leapt to volley home a Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang cross to secure all three points for the Gunners.
headlines.shortLinkText: Torreira grabs late winner for Arsenal

headlines.description: Burnley earned a badly-needed three points to move out of the Premier League relegation zone with a hard-earned 1-0 win over Brighton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley out of the relegation zone with vital win

headlines.description: Southampton began life under new manager Ralph Hasenhuttl with a tame 1-0 Premier League defeat at fellow strugglers Cardiff City on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hasenhuttl era begins with Southampton defeat

headlines.description: Manchester United earned their first Premier League win in five games with a comfortable 4-1 victory over bottom side Fulham at Old Trafford on Satu
headlines.shortLinkText: United crush Fulham to end five-game winless run

events.name: Crystal Palace at West Ham United

headlines.description: West Ham United continued their fine recent form with a 3-2 come-from-behind derby win at home to Crystal Palace in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham beat Palace to extend winning run

headlines.description: Manchester City's loss to Chelsea knocks the defending champions into second place in the standings, behind undefeated Liverpool.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea hand Man City first Prem loss of season

headlines.description: Son Heung-Min and Dele Alli each scored to give Tottenham Hotspur a 2-0 victory over Leicester City in Premier League action on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Son, Alli score as Tottenham handle Leicester
